page.title: 13Tourism
page.content: Tourism is very important in Port Isaac.There are many gift shops,cafes and restaurants,holiday cottages and guest houses.People come for the sea and the beautiful countryside.All of the people apart from the ones who live abroad who we interveiwed came by car.Mostly they were staying nearby in caravans,with friends or in self catering accommodation.The length of most peoples holidays was 1-3 weeks. All of them apart from 2 had stayed in Cornwall before and they realy liked their holiday even though the weather had not been very nice. The things that people like doing on holiday are walking and swimming and the things that people would llke improved are the roads. Several people said that they would like better car parking facilities and less traffic in the villages.
